languages.text: "Тоже мне, капитан. Валила бы ты лучше, пока еще можно. Понимаю твои нежные чувства к "Амасекусу", но не стоит эта дыра того, чтобы за нее подыхать. У меня тут шаттл припрятан неподалеку, так что можем хоть сейчас..."

traits.locale_text: "Окти, дорогая, послушай старую Риззу — валила бы ты лучше отсюда, пока еще можно. Понимаю твои нежные чувства к "Амасекусу", но не стоит эта дыра того, не стоит. У меня тут шаттл припрятан неподалеку, так что можем хоть сейчас..."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."
languages.original_text: "Тоже мне, капитан. Валила бы ты лучше, пока еще можно. Понимаю твои нежные чувства к "Амасекусу", но не стоит эта дыра того, чтобы за нее подыхать. У меня тут шаттл припрятан неподалеку, так что можем хоть сейчас..."

traits.locale_text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “你算哪门子的船长？如果我是你，我就会抓住这个机会逃命。我知道你对烈酒修会很有感情，但这个垃圾堆根本不值得你送死。我在附近藏了一架穿梭机，只要你想走，咱们现在就可以起飞……”
languages.original_text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."

traits.locale_text: “你算哪门子的船长？如果我是你，我就会抓住这个机会逃命。我知道你对烈酒修会很有感情，但这个垃圾堆根本不值得你送死。我在附近藏了一架穿梭机，只要你想走，咱们现在就可以起飞……”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「どこかの中隊長です。私だったら、逃げれる内に逃げますよ。アマセッカスに愛着があるのはよく分かる。でも、この穴は死ぬに値しない。近くにシャトルを隠してあるんです。今すぐにでも離陸できるようにね…」
languages.original_text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."

traits.locale_text: 「どこかの中隊長です。私だったら、逃げれる内に逃げますよ。アマセッカスに愛着があるのはよく分かる。でも、この穴は死ぬに値しない。近くにシャトルを隠してあるんです。今すぐにでも離陸できるようにね…」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Menuda capitana. Si fuera usted, me largaría mientras pueda. Sé que está unida al Amasecus, pero no vale la pena morir por este agujero. Tengo una lanzadera escondida cerca, así que podríamos despegar ahora mismo...».
languages.original_text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."

traits.locale_text: «Menuda capitana. Si fuera usted, me largaría mientras pueda. Sé que está unida al Amasecus, pero no vale la pena morir por este agujero. Tengo una lanzadera escondida cerca, así que podríamos despegar ahora mismo...».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Toller Captain. Ich an Eurer Stelle würde verschwinden, so lange es noch geht. Ich weiß, Ihr hängt am Amasecus, aber dieses Drecksloch ist es nicht wert, dafür zu sterben. Ich habe in der Nähe ein Shuttle versteckt, wir könnten also sofort abheben ..."
languages.original_text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."

traits.locale_text: "Toller Captain. Ich an Eurer Stelle würde verschwinden, so lange es noch geht. Ich weiß, Ihr hängt am Amasecus, aber dieses Drecksloch ist es nicht wert, dafür zu sterben. Ich habe in der Nähe ein Shuttle versteckt, wir könnten also sofort abheben ..."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Tu parles... Si j'étais toi, je décamperais tant que c'est encore possible. Je sais que tu tiens à l'Amasecus, mais ce bouge ne vaut pas le coup d'y laisser sa peau. J'ai une navette cachée non loin d'ici, on pourrait mettre les voiles tout de suite... »
languages.original_text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."

traits.locale_text: « Tu parles... Si j'étais toi, je décamperais tant que c'est encore possible. Je sais que tu tiens à l'Amasecus, mais ce bouge ne vaut pas le coup d'y laisser sa peau. J'ai une navette cachée non loin d'ici, on pourrait mettre les voiles tout de suite... »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Kaptanmış... Yerinde olsam vaktim varken kaçardım. Amasekus'tan vazgeçemiyorsun da bu delik için ölmeye değmez. Yakınlarda gizli bir mekiğim var, istersen hemen kaçabiliriz..."
languages.original_text: "Some captain. If I were you, I'd scram while the scramming's good. I know you're attached to the Amasecus, but this hole isn't worth dying for. I have a shuttle hidden away nearby, so we could take off right now..."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptanmış, peh. Yerinde olsam vaktim varken kaçardım. Amasekus'tan vazgeçemiyorsun, biliyorum ama bu delik için ölmeye değmez. Yakınlarda gizli bir mekiğim var, istersen hemen kaçabiliriz..."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
